articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Apple puts Vision Pro exec in charge of Siri in exec shakeup - TechCrunch
articles.description: As Apple's Siri comes under attack for failing at the most basic queries, the company is shaking up leadership in charge of Apple's AI features for Siri.
articles.content: As Apple’s Siri comes under attack for failing at the most basic queries, the company is shaking up leadership in charge of Apple’s AI features for Siri. According to Bloomberg, Apple CEO Tim Cook is… [+1008 chars]
